channel.title: If you need help, I can hand out a few tips here and there
channel.description:
Some of you will probably be all like, who the fudge are you?
Well, im owner of Project P2P and I know most of the people on moparscape...AREN'T any help at all to be honest.
So if you need help I can offer a few tips here and there, but I can't answer everything I'm not a god in coding! :)
So if you do need help, theres a live chat support button, that I created so you can talk to me personally through that and ask anything...
it's on my website ofc, projectp2p it's right at the top, and it's not hard to miss, just click that and if it's another operator, just ask for me, and i'm sure they'll transfer you right to me.
Just trying to lend a helping hand, ;)
oh and if you hate me for some apparent reason, gg, hate over the internet is lame lol.

item.title: If you need help, I can hand out a few tips here and there
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

If your working with a router, You will need to forward your prots 43595 for people to connect to your server, Also for your no-ip domain to work, you will have to forward port 80.

Read full topic

item.title: If you need help, I can hand out a few tips here and there

item.description:
@Scruixx wrote:

I need help, I run divinePK source…

I have a problem, how do I get the register site onto a no-ip domain?

  • People cant connect to my server when I edit the settings file to my own ip…
    Only working with localhost, either post the answers here or add me on my msn hohodyretcss@hotmail.com
    Thanks

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @BuyMyJunk BuyMyJunk
item.description:
@BuyMyJunk wrote:

tonypker13:

Im not from RS2 But yes I used to be. And WTF r u talking about?I found tuts there EVERY time I needed something when I was in RS2…

your not from rs2 but you use to be?
that makes you rs2 along with haveing well over half of you post were rs2 releated that makes you rs2
stay there make it easier on everyone else

you will not find an abundance of rsc tutorials as you will for rs2
you need to at least know somewhat of what your doing, and copy and pasting isnt know what your doing

Read full topic

item.title: If you need help, I can hand out a few tips here and there
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote=“Lavoris, post:3, topic:232095”]Yea… and where do I see me advertising? All it sais is project p2p, im pretty sure by now people are smart to look on google for the website

++

There is not that many turtorials on much things “tonypker13”

And in 5 seconds? yea… right,

You sir, are most likely from RS2.[/quote]
I own a RSC server…
Im not from RS2 But yes I used to be. And WTF r u talking about?I found tuts there EVERY time I needed something when I was in RS2…

bonzakid:

I agree with Lavoris. There are alot of noobs on these forums posting about noob questions in wrong categories. good idea mate.

And Yes your right, But dont deny that you weren’t one of those nubs. Every1 was… Im not saying we posted in wrong catagories but EVERYONE asked stupid questions atleast once or twice…

Read full topic
